description: {"blocks":[{"key":"aqhtv","text":"This protocol describes the Go/No-Go criteria, QC/QA steps, and metrics used in the \"Multimodal Molecular Imaging\" pipeline by the Vanderbilt University Tissue Interrogation Site (VU TIS) as part of the Kidney Precision Medicine Project (KPMP).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: VU Biomolecular Multimodal Imaging Center / Spraggins Research Group

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9an2m","text":"To accept KPMP samples for analysis, the following sample processing Go/No-Go criteria in Table 1 must be met:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":90,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t4vu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72aq2","text":"Table 1. Sample Processing Go/No-Go Criteria","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg6bc","text":"   AB1Go/No-Go Criteria  Reasoning  2Biopsy must be LN2 core  Other storage conditions can induce analyte suppression effect in MALDI IMS analysis  3Biopsy size must be \u003e 3mm  Smaller tissue sections are difficult to handle, section, and mount  4Time to preservation must be \u003c 10 minProlonged exposure prior to preservation can cause metabolite/lipid degradation  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":364}],"data":{}},{"key":"88nhs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3vfga","text":"Accepted biopsies will be cryo-sectioned to 10 µm thickness and visually assessed following the QC metrics described in Table 2 before data collection. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":120,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ntv3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90hsd","text":"Table 2. Tissue QC Metrics","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lbr1","text":"   AB1Tissue QCReasoning / Data Flags2Are there any glomeruli in the biopsy section?Ensures proper coverage of biological features3Visible cracks/folds on the tissue surfaceThis can lower FTU segmentation performance, due to non-segmentable features4Visible freezing artifacts on the tissue surfaceFreezing artifacts can induce analyte delocalization, jeopardizing MALDI IMS spatial integrity","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":392}],"data":{}},{"key":"47frh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_2":{"className":" "}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["271","326"],"data":[["Go/No-Go Criteria","  \u003cb\u003eReasoning\u003c/b\u003e  "],["Biopsy must be LN2 core\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e  ","Other storage conditions can induce analyte suppression effect in MALDI IMS analysis  "],["Biopsy size must be \u0026gt; 3mm  ","Smaller tissue sections are difficult to handle, section, and mount  "],["Time to preservation must be \u0026lt; 10 min","Prolonged exposure prior to preservation can cause metabolite/lipid degradation  "]],"guid":"4D79AC53326E409B959A218938B12D27","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6urhe","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Go/No-Go Criteria","  \u003cb\u003eReasoning\u003c/b\u003e  "],["Biopsy must be LN2 core\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e  ","Other storage conditions can induce analyte suppression effect in MALDI IMS analysis  "],["Biopsy size must be \u0026gt; 3mm  ","Smaller tissue sections are difficult to handle, section, and mount  "],["Time to preservation must be \u0026lt; 10 min","Prolonged exposure prior to preservation can cause metabolite/lipid degradation  "]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["232","367"],"data":[["\u003cb\u003eTissue QC\u003c/b\u003e","\u003cb\u003eReasoning / Data Flags\u003c/b\u003e"],["Are there any glomeruli in the biopsy section?\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e","Ensures proper coverage of biological features"],["Are there visible cracks/folds on the tissue surface?","This can lower FTU segmentation performance, due to non-segmentable features"],["Are there visible freezing artifacts on the tissue surface?","Freezing artifacts can induce analyte delocalization, jeopardizing MALDI IMS spatial integrity"]],"guid":"F056032704AB4DF9851E522C1904333F","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fmjc7","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["\u003cb\u003eTissue QC\u003c/b\u003e","\u003cb\u003eReasoning / Data Flags\u003c/b\u003e"],["Are there any glomeruli in the biopsy section?\u003cb\u003e\u003c/b\u003e","Ensures proper coverage of biological features"],["Are there visible cracks/folds on the tissue surface?","This can lower FTU segmentation performance, due to non-segmentable features"],["Are there visible freezing artifacts on the tissue surface?","Freezing artifacts can induce analyte delocalization, jeopardizing MALDI IMS spatial integrity"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1bq2h","text":"Autofluorescence microscopy QC is performed prior to collecting autofluorescence data from KPMP biopsies. A detailed protocol for Autofluorescence Microscopy QC data collection is included here.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":189,"length":4}],"data":{}},{"key":"61m6i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35thr","text":"The mean fluorescence intensity (above the noise level) is calculated for each channel (eGFP, DAPI, DsRed) and monitored over time. To pass QC, intensity should be within ±15% of the mean for each channel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1EE8820031464D3BA150F4D6FFDD0699","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.e6nvwjm5dlmk/v1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b409a","text":"Autofluorescence-based FTU segmentation is performed on each KPMP biopsy and for one reference tissue, termed BlockQC. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":110,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bmea","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejsvg","text":"Percent coverage is calculated for each tissue section. A coverage \u003e60% meets QC standards. When lower segmentation coverage is observed, the data is flagged for re-evaluation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"70hpn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9hq74","text":"MALDI IMS Data Collection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9aluk","text":"Mass calibration is performed prior to MALDI IMS data collection. The mass must be calibrated to \u003c1 ppm error, corresponding to a 95% calibration score in the software. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ca6la","text":"Mass calibration and subsequent MALDI IMS data are also collected on an external reference tissue section (BlockQC).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":107,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"en2br","text":"MALDI IMS Data Analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehnce","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9s8tt","text":"Global Parameter Monitoring","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":27},{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjod5","text":"Table 3 Summarizes the QC metrics for tracking the global performance of MALDI IMS. QC metrics for LC-MS/MS data analysis are also included in the table. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"uu1k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8e4fm","text":"Table 3. QC Metrics for MALDI IMS Global Parameters","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40c54","text":" Parameter Expected Performance Notes Mean intensity variability* ± 15% BlockQC section: Significant deviation from the mean intensity may suggest problems with the instrumentation. Instrument performance will be assessed. Number of detected peaks* > 600 (positive mode) > 900 (negative mode) Adaptive S/N thresholding is applied until the minimal acceptable peaks are detected. Number of annotated peaks ~ 270 (positive mode) ~ 450 (negative mode) Expected range, but real numbers may vary, especially in KPMP biopsies with CKD or AKI. Common annotated peaks > 150 (positive mode) > 220 (negative mode) Expected range, but real numbers may vary, especially in KPMP biopsies with CKD or AKI. LC-MS/MS > 300 (positive mode) > 300 (negative mode) Expected range, but real numbers may vary, especially in KPMP biopsies with CKD or AKI. ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":976}],"data":{}},{"key":"cso3m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"mrdp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"afia","text":"Individual Ion Monitoring","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25},{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pil3","text":"For a set of diagnostic ions (in each polarity), we will monitor five parameters Listed in Table 4. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":91,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71kcg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3obm7","text":"Table 4. QC Metrics for MALDI IMS Individual Ion Parameters","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1bcfr","text":" Parameter Expected Performance Notes Peak Alignment - Visual interpretation and marked for pre-processing if not well aligned. Realignment may be performed. Peak Width ± 10% Expected deviation, however real values may vary for lower intensity species. Mass Error* ± 5 ppm BlockQC: If abnormally high ppm errors are detected for the set panel of individual ions, the data are flagged for pre-processing. Individual datasets can be recalibrated (internally) with different ions. Mass Resolution ± 10% Significant deviations may be indicative of compromised instrument performance. Instrument performance will be assessed. Peak Intensity ± 15% BlockQC: We allow for a wider peak intensity variability, as even within the same tissue block, analyte intensity is highly dependent on the sampled structures. KPMP biopsies: CKD and AKI may significantly impact the peak intensity of the monitored panel of ions; therefore no meaningful boundary can be estimated here. ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1102}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ej4k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hhls","text":"Global parameters and individual ion monitoring is performed on both KPMP samples as well as for the external reference tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":"","B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["155","164","361"],"data":[[" Parameter ","QC Threshold"," Notes "],[" Mean intensity variability* ","± 15% ","BlockQC section: Significant deviation from the mean intensity may suggest problems with the instrumentation. Instrument performance will be assessed. "],[" Number of detected peaks* ","> 600 (positive mode) > 900 (negativemode) ","Adaptive S/N thresholding is applied until the minimal acceptable peaks are detected."],[" Number of annotated peaks ","~ 270 (positive mode) ~ 450 (negative mode) ","Expected range, but real numbers may vary, especially in KPMP biopsies with CKD or AKI. "],[" Common annotated peaks ","> 150 (positive mode) > 220 (negative mode) ","Expected range, but real numbers may vary, especially in KPMP biopsies with CKD or AKI. "],[" LC-MS/MS ","> 300 (positive mode) > 300 (negative mode) ","Expected range, but real numbers may vary, especially in KPMP biopsies with CKD or AKI. "]],"guid":"D416CAE2F7124FFE963D6B6C2E92B106","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":71,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"e8ntf","text":"*Denotes critical data flags in the workflow that require re-processing","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[[" Parameter ","QC Threshold"," Notes "],[" Mean intensity variability* ","± 15% ","BlockQC section: Significant deviation from the mean intensity may suggest problems with the instrumentation. Instrument performance will be assessed. "],[" Number of detected peaks* ","> 600 (positive mode) > 900 (negativemode) ","Adaptive S/N thresholding is applied until the minimal acceptable peaks are detected."],[" Number of annotated peaks ","~ 270 (positive mode) ~ 450 (negative mode) ","Expected range, but real numbers may vary, especially in KPMP biopsies with CKD or AKI. {"blocks":[{"key":"6rgqq","text":"The collected QC data will be compiled in Levy-Jennings plots to longitudinally track the performance of the assays. QC data for both the KPMP samples and the reference tissue are summarized and reported. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
